borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2022/01882/FUL granted 13th June 2024 for the 'Change of use of the basement and ground floor level from retail (Class E) into 2 x 1 bedroom self-contained flats (Class C3); replacement of existing shopfront with new doors and windows; alterations to the front lightwell and pavement light in connection with the formation of utility room and refuse storage at basement level; part opening up of the existing central vault to form a bike store at basement level; demolition of the roof and part of the back wall to the rear office room at ground floor level to form an open patio space, and installation of new doors and window openings at basement and ground floor level to the rear elevation; erection of an external staircase from basement to ground floor level at the front of the property' to allow amendments to the design of the front window glazing at basement level.
